channel.title: Which Theme would be better for my Site?
channel.description:
K so I've searched all over for free themes for "E107" and there all shit.
I've then found these two.
The site is a Poker community with PhpBB intergrated with it.
K so the themes are, Bearing in mind i still have yet to design or ask someone to design me a logo.
1) http://e107.xenthemes.com/lazer/news.php
Or
2) http://e107.xenthemes.com/storm/news.php
Or Even show me a better theme?

item.title: Which Theme would be better for my Site?

item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

huh?

Read full topic

item.title: Which Theme would be better for my Site?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:14, topic:381703”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=477507.msg3498112#msg3498112 date=1297503821]

e107 is garbage.

Hmm, I’ve actually never heard of it before, but with a quick glance I don’t see anything inherently wrong with it. Care to enlighten us?
[/quote]
Probably because you don’t have the eye for design.[/quote]
I definitely don’t. But I wasn’t talking about design, I was talking about e107.

Read full topic

item.title: Which Theme would be better for my Site?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

TheBeanie:

Will it do until i can afford someone to make me one?

Until you have a decent userbase, yes. IMO there’s no need to hire a theme designer without any forum members. Another suggestion: if your site becomes active, make a poll to decide the new theme for the site.

Read full topic
